hook.text: Someone in {faction} is quietly buying any rumor of it—paying too much, asking too little.
Those who sleep near it hear distant bells and wake with a destination in mind.
Storms linger when it’s nearby, as if the sky is waiting for an answer.
A smiling stranger insists it was borrowed, not stolen—and offers a trade that feels unfair.
The dead seem to notice it. Tomb-candles gutter as it passes, and graves settle restlessly.
A healer’s network wants it delivered to {place} before an approaching crisis.
